content:
I'd be happy to help you with that quest in Assassin's Creed Odyssey.

First, congratulations on playing the game since November 20th! That's a great commitment to the game.

To help you with the quest, could you please provide more details about the quest you're stuck on? Here are some questions to get started:

1. What's the name of the quest you're stuck on?
2. What's the objective of the quest (e.g., kill a certain person, retrieve an item, etc.)?
3. Where are you in the game world (e.g., which region, city, or island)?
4. What's the specific problem you're facing (e.g., can't find a way to progress, stuck in combat, etc.)?

The more information you can provide, the better I'll be able to assist you.
